mapper.select: select s1.*, s2.arre from ( select user.id, user.idcard, user.password, user.name, user.money as decimals, user.header_img as headerImage, user.grande as sex, user.phone, user.create_time, user.update_time, user.username, user.user_id, address.address from user left join address on user.user_id = address.user_id where user.user_id = #{openId} or (address.user_id = #{openId} and is_check = 1) ) as s1 LEFT JOIN (select sum(arrears.money) as arre, arrears.user_id as arrears from arrears where arrears.user_id = #{openId}) as s2 on s1.user_id = s2.arrears

SELECT l.id as aid, l.user_id as auser_id, l.username as aname, l.create_time as atime, orders.* FROM `arrears` as l LEFT JOIN orders on l.order_id = orders.order_id where l.arruser_id = #{userId} ORDER BY l.create_time desc
